title: Trump envoys press plan with Ukraine as sanctions eased on Russia
description: President Donald Trump's envoys were to meet Thursday with Ukrainian negotiators for the third time in two weeks to press his plan to end the war as his administration eased economic pressure on Russia.
content:
WASHINGTON
